Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.personalBoard.depots

Class StrongBoxDepot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.personalBoard.depots.Depot
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.personalBoard.depots.StrongBoxDepot
Direct Known Subclasses:
TemporaryDepot
public class StrongBoxDepot
extends Depot
Depot that include four StrongBoxContainers: one for each resource

  • Constructor Details

    • StrongBoxDepot

      public StrongBoxDepot()
      Class constructor. Instantiates a new Strong Box. It also instantiates four strong box containers set with the four different concrete resource.

  • Method Details

    • addResources

      public void addResources​(ResourceType resourceType, int numResource)
      Performs the increment of the resource's count in the strong box
      Overrides:
      addResources in class Depot
      Parameters:
      resourceType - the resource type of the resources to be added
      numResource - the number of resources to be added

    • removeResources

      public void removeResources​(ResourceType resourceType, int numResource) throws it.polimi.ingsw.utils.exceptions.DepotException
      Performs the removal of the quantity of the specified resource from the correspondent strong box container.
      Specified by:
      removeResources in class Depot
      Parameters:
      resourceType - the resource to be removed
      numResource - the amount of the resource that has to be removed
      Throws:
      it.polimi.ingsw.utils.exceptions.DepotException - if the strongbox container's size is less than the numResource

    • getAllResourceCount

      public int getAllResourceCount()
      Gets the count of all resources, which it is useful when the game is ending to count the resources and convert them into victory points
      Specified by:
      getAllResourceCount in class Depot
      Returns:
      sum of all resources in the strong box
